Services Pricing Team
At-home express

Easy COVID-19 Test

FDA-approved RT-qPCR test is validated to detect active SARS-CoV-2 virus in individuals suspected of exposure to COVID-19 virus. After a brief online medical screen, your collection kit will be sent to your home. Samples are sent to and processed at our partner's laboratory. The results will be emailed to you within 24 hours from the time we receive your sample.

$200 ($177 + $23 shipping)

Test Your Family at Home in 4 Easy Steps:

1

Receive Kit

Receive your kit by express mail or courier service.

2

Collect Sample

Follow the included instructions to collect your sample.

3

Return Kit

Return your sample within 24 hours by using the pre-paid shipping label.

4

View Results

Your results will be sent to you by mail within 24 hours of our lab receiving your complete testing kit materials.

Frequently asked questions

What kind of test do we use?

We have partnered with MicroGenDX to offer FDA-approved Reverse Transcriptase PCR (rRT-PCR) assay for the specific detection of the SARS-CoV-2 virus. The assay validation exceeds the minimum recommendations put forth by the FDA guidance policies.

How do you administer the test?

You will receive a kit that includes easy-to use sputum collection device. Simply collect and ship it back at your convenience.

Is this test covered by insurance?

In many cases we are able to work with your insurance providers to reduce and often eliminate the costs of the testing.

How often should we test our employees?

Most our clients elect for seasonal testing, once every three months.

We are doing our part during the pandemic, by providing our services at cost, which includes:
